alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Mitchell and northeastern Osborne Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Downs, or 24 miles west of Beloit, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cawker City around 450 PM CDT. Tipton around 455 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
